{{also|reise}} ==German== ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ˈʁaɪ̯zə/}} * {{rhymes|de|aɪ̯zə}} * {{audio|de|De-Reise.ogg|Audio}} * {{audio|de|De-at-Reise.ogg|audio (Austria)}} ===Etymology 1=== From {{inh|de|gmh|reise}}, {{m|gmh|reis}}, from {{inh|de|goh|reisa}}, from {{inh|de|gem-pro|*raisō}}.
